Flow.description: This Process moved to Flow = Opportunity: Email Alerts

value.stringValue: and( or( ischanged([Opportunity].Product_1__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_2__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_3__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_4__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_5__c), ischanged([Opportunity].StageName)), or( BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_1__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_1__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_2__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_2__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_3__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_3__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_4__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_4__r.Name,"FW"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_5__r.Name,"LISA-C"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_5__r.Name,"FW")))

and( or( ischanged([Opportunity].Product_1__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_2__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_3__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_4__c), ischanged([Opportunity].Product_5__c), ischanged([Opportunity].StageName)), or( BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_1__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_1__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_2__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_2__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_3__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_3__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_4__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_4__r.Name,"SARA-G"), BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_5__r.Name,"LEON"),BEGINS([Opportunity].Product_5__r.Name,"SARA-G")))

value.stringValue: The created record is for one of the embargo countries. Please check the Export Control Guideline provided by Legal (see https://wiki.u-blox.com/bin/view/Generic/LegalHome ).
